alert.note: Alert for York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 4:40PM EDT until August 07 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern York County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 440 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pennville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hanover, Parkville, Codorus, Spring Grove, Glen Rock, Pennville, Jacobus, York Airport, Loganville, Abbottstown, New Salem and Seven Valleys. Radar has indicated rotation within this severe thunderstorm. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, tornadoes can develop quickly during severe thunderstorms. This includes Interstate 83 from mile markers 8 to 12. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for south central Pennsylvania. Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, they can develop quickly during severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado, act quickly and move to a place of safety inside a sturdy structure such as a basement or small interior room.
